org.apache.hama.bsp.BSPJobID

  • Packages that use BSPJobID 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hama.bsp
    BSP computing framework.
    org.apache.hama.bsp.ft  
    org.apache.hama.bsp.sync
    Contains the base implementation of a barrier synchronization agent.
    org.apache.hama.ipc
    Tools to help define network clients and servers.
